name: Definitely Sneaky But Not Sneaky
description: Fast-paced action, tight controls, and instant replayability. Unlock over 200 levels with a variety of different enemies and scenarios. Play them by yourself or grab some friends and play locally with up to 4 players!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 227 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
